data.fluent-bit.conf:
[SERVICE]
   Flush        1
   Daemon       Off
   Log_Level    info
   Log_File     /u01/logs/fluentbit
   Parsers_File /fluent-bit/parser/parsers.conf

[INPUT]
   Name            tail
   Path            /u01/logs/*.log
   Path_Key        source
   Exclude_Path    *.[1-9].log
   Read_From_Head  true
   Tag             application
   DB              /u01/logs/application.db
   Buffer_Max_Size 512k
   Skip_Long_Lines On
   Mem_Buf_Limit   20MB
   Rotate_Wait     10
   Key             event

[INPUT]
   Name            tail
   Path            /u01/logs/*.access
   Path_Key        source
   Exclude_Path    *.[1-9].access
   Read_From_Head  true
   Tag             access
   DB              /u01/logs/access.db
   Buffer_Max_Size 512k
   Skip_Long_Lines On
   Mem_Buf_Limit   20MB
   Rotate_Wait     10
   Key             event

[INPUT]
   Name             tail
   Path             /u01/logs/fluentbit
   Path_Key         source
   Tag              fluentbit
   Refresh_Interval 5
   Read_from_Head   true
   Key              event

[FILTER]
   Name             stdout
   Match            fluentbit

[FILTER]
   Name parser
   Match application
   Key_Name event
   Parser timeParser
   Preserve_Key On
   Reserve_Data On

[FILTER]
   name multiline
   match application
   multiline.key_content event
   multiline.parser multiline-log4j

[FILTER]
   Name  modify
   Match *
   Add   host ${POD_NAME}
   Add   environment ${POD_NAMESPACE}
   Add   nodetype openshift
   Add   name komplex
   Add   cluster utv

[OUTPUT]
   Name             splunk
   Match            application 
   Host             ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port             ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token     ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS              On
   TLS.Verify       Off
   event_index      test-index
   event_sourcetype log4j
   event_host       ${POD_NAME}
   event_source     $source
   event_field      application $name
   event_field      cluster $cluster
   event_field      environment $environment
   event_field      nodetype $nodetype
   event_key        $event

[OUTPUT]
   Name             splunk
   Match            access 
   Host             ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port             ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token     ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS              On
   TLS.Verify       Off
   event_index      test-index
   event_sourcetype access_combined
   event_host       ${POD_NAME}
   event_source     $source
   event_field      application $name
   event_field      cluster $cluster
   event_field      environment $environment
   event_field      nodetype $nodetype
   event_key        $event

[OUTPUT]
   Name             splunk
   Match            fluentbit 
   Host             ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port             ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token     ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS              On
   TLS.Verify       Off
   event_index      test-index
   event_sourcetype fluentbit
   event_host       ${POD_NAME}
   event_source     $source
   event_field      application $name
   event_field      cluster $cluster
   event_field      environment $environment
   event_field      nodetype $nodetype
   event_key        $event
